doxylamine.name: Doxylamine
doxylamine.treats: Use helps to reduce difficulty in falling asleep
doxylamine.warnings: Warnings do not use in children under 12 years of age with any other product containing doxylamine unless you have time for a full night’s sleep ask a doctor before use if you have a breathing problem

pantoprazole.name: Pantoprazole
pantoprazole.treats: 1 indications and usage pantoprazole sodium for injection is used to treat treatment of: gastroesophageal reflux disease (gerd) and a history of erosive esophagitis (ee) for up to 10 days in adults
pantoprazole.warnings: 5 warnings and precautions gastric malignancy : in adults, symptomatic response to therapy with pantoprazole sodium does not preclude the presence of gastric malignancy
